mapper.select: SELECT p.PRODUCTNAME,p.productIdx ,ac.accountNo, TO_CHAR(trDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LastTrDate, balance ,interestRate FROM ACCOUNT ac LEFT OUTER JOIN TRANSACTION tr ON ac.ACCOUNTNO = tr.ACCOUNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT p ON ac.PRODUCTIDX = p.PRODUCTIDX JOIN depositProduct d ON ac.PRODUCTIDX = d.PRODUCTIDX WHERE (ac.accountNO, TRDATE) IN ( SELECT accountNO, MAX(TRDATE) FROM TRANSACTION GROUP BY ACCOUNTNO ) AND memberIdx =#{memberIdx} AND p.productIdx =1 AND status=#{status} ORDER BY ac.ACCOUNTNO ASC

SELECT p.productName,p.productIdx,ac.accountNo,balance,TO_CHAR(trDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')lastTrDate,interest FROM ACCOUNT ac LEFT OUTER JOIN TRANSACTION tr ON ac.ACCOUNTNO = tr.ACCOUNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT p ON ac.PRODUCTIDX = p.PRODUCTIDX JOIN savingsProduct s ON s.productIdx = ac.productIdx WHERE (ac.accountNO, trDate) IN ( SELECT accountNO, MAX(trDate) FROM TRANSACTION GROUP BY ACCOUNTNO ) AND memberIdx =#{memberIdx} AND p.productIdx =2 AND status=#{status} ORDER BY ac.ACCOUNTNO ASC

SELECT a.accountNo,a.createDate,d.interestRate,p.productName,p.productDetail FROM account a JOIN depositProduct d ON a.productIdx = d.productIdx JOIN product p ON a.productIdx = p.productIdx WHERE a.ACCOUNTNO =#{accountNo} AND status=1

SELECT a.accountNo,a.createDate,p.productName,p.productDetail,productType, entryDate,monthly,interest,vipInterest,savingType,interestType,tax FROM account a JOIN savingsProduct s ON a.productIdx = s.productIdx JOIN product p ON a.productIdx = p.productIdx WHERE a.ACCOUNTNO=#{accountNo} AND status=1
SELECT lastName,firstName,addr1,addr2,zipcode,tel,userid FROM member m JOIN memberinfo i ON m.memberidx=i.memberidx WHERE m.memberidx= #{memberIdx}
SELECT SUM(balance)totBal FROM transaction t JOIN account a ON t.accountNo = a.accountNo JOIN depositProduct d ON a.productIdx = d.productIdx WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx} AND status=1
SELECT SUM(balance) totBal FROM transaction t JOIN account a ON t.accountNo = a.accountNo JOIN savingsProduct s ON a.productIdx = s.productIdx WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx} AND status=1
SELECT accountNo FROM account WHERE memberIdx= #{memberIdx} AND status=1
SELECT balance FROM transaction WHERE accountNo = #{accountNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM account WHERE accountNo=#{accountNo} AND accountPwd=#{accountPwd}
SELECT productName FROM product WHERE productIdx=#{productIdx}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT accountNo ,TO_CHAR(createDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')createDate FROM account WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx} AND status=1 ORDER BY createDate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM=1
